mapper.sql: select stk.id, stk.material_id, stk.department_id, stk.qty, stk.unit_price, stk.amt, stk.batch_no, stk.material_no, stk.material_date, stk.warehouse_date, stk.kc_no, d.id dId,d.code departmentCode,d.name departmentName, m.id mId,m.code materialCode,m.name materialName, s.id sId,s.code supplierCode,s.name supplierName, (select entry.begin_time from stk_io_bill_entry entry inner join stk_io_bill bill on bill.id = entry.paren_id where entry.batch_no = stk.batch_no and entry.material_id = stk.material_id and entry.del_flag = 0 and bill.bill_type = 201 and bill.del_flag = 0 order by bill.id desc limit 1) as begin_time, (select entry.end_time from stk_io_bill_entry entry inner join stk_io_bill bill on bill.id = entry.paren_id where entry.batch_no = stk.batch_no and entry.material_id = stk.material_id and entry.del_flag = 0 and bill.bill_type = 201 and bill.del_flag = 0 order by bill.id desc limit 1) as end_time, (select bill.bill_no from stk_io_bill_entry entry inner join stk_io_bill bill on bill.id = entry.paren_id where entry.batch_no = stk.batch_no and entry.material_id = stk.material_id and entry.del_flag = 0 and bill.bill_type = 201 and bill.del_flag = 0 order by bill.id desc limit 1) as out_order_no from stk_dep_inventory stk left join fd_department d on stk.department_id = d.id left join fd_material m on stk.material_id = m.id left join fd_supplier s on stk.supplier_id = s.id
mapper.insert:
insert into stk_dep_inventory
material_id, department_id, qty, unit_price, amt, batch_no, material_no, material_date, warehouse_date, supplier_id, kc_no,
#{materialId}, #{departmentId}, #{qty}, #{unitPrice}, #{amt}, #{batchNo}, #{materialNo}, #{materialDate}, #{warehouseDate}, #{supplierId}, #{kcNo},
mapper.delete: update stk_dep_inventory set del_flag = 1, update_time = now() where id = #{id}

mapper.select: select * from stk_dep_inventory where batch_no = #{batchNo} order by id desc limit 1
select SUM(IFNULL(qty, 0)) from stk_dep_inventory where batch_no = #{batchNo}

select m.code as materialCode, m.name as materialName, m.speci as specification, m.model, '' as unit, d.name as departmentName, '' as warehouseName, SUM(stk.qty) as totalQty, AVG(stk.unit_price) as avgUnitPrice, SUM(stk.amt) as totalAmount, COUNT(DISTINCT stk.batch_no) as batchCount from stk_dep_inventory stk left join fd_department d on stk.department_id = d.id left join fd_material m on stk.material_id = m.id where stk.qty > 0 and stk.material_id = #{materialId} and stk.department_id = #{departmentId} group by stk.material_id, stk.department_id, m.code, m.name, m.speci, m.model, d.name order by m.code, d.name

select bill.id, bill.bill_no as billNo, bill.bill_type as billType, bill.bill_status as billStatus, bill.bill_date as billDate, m.code as materialCode, m.name as materialName, m.speci as specification, m.model, d.name as departmentName, w.name as warehouseName, entry.qty, entry.unit_price as unitPrice, entry.amt as amount, entry.batch_no as batchNo, bill.create_by as createBy, bill.remark from stk_io_bill bill left join stk_io_bill_entry entry on bill.id = entry.paren_id left join fd_department d on bill.department_id = d.id left join fd_material m on entry.material_id = m.id left join fd_warehouse w on bill.warehouse_id = w.id where bill.del_flag = 0 and entry.material_id = #{materialId} and bill.department_id = #{departmentId} and bill.warehouse_id = #{warehouseId} and bill.bill_type = #{billType} and bill.bill_status = #{billStatus} and bill.bill_date >= #{beginDate} and bill.bill_date <= #{endDate} order by bill.bill_date desc, bill.bill_no
